message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, I am only able to offer $11,000 for it at this time. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500, which is a fair price for both of us. Let's make this deal happen!
